1.title: From the Invention of Gunpowder

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: From the simple stone axe to firearms that helped concur the land that would become the United States of America.

2.title: From the Flintlock to the Percussion Cap

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: From the stock piles of firearms used in the U.S. Colonies fight for independence, to the creation of the American gun.

3.title: The Weapons of the Civil War

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: From the North to the South the firearms that won the Civil War.

4.title: Post Civil War Weaspons and the Winning of the West

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: From the Post-Civil War military to the wild frontier, the demand for firearms was growing.

5.title: The Weapons of WWI

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The machine gun changed the warfront and defined and dominated the WWI experience.

6.title: The Weapons of WWII

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: The need to keep up with modern warfare sparked invention and economic growth.

7.title: Post WWII to Today: From the M-14 to the M4 Carbine

episode of.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: The field of battle was growing smaller and the invention of a light weight and short range firearms were necessary for combat.

imdb.plot outline: The great gift of man over beasts has been his ability to craft and use tools. A simple stone axe gave man the power to shape the world around him. A spear -- the difference between a family living or dying... But the axe and the spear could also become weapons, as individuals, tribes, and eventually nations struggled against each other in their fierce determination to survive. Since the invention of firearms in China more than 900 years ago, the GUN, has been both a tool to conquer game and a weapon for killing men. GUNS gave individual men great power, and gave groups of men the power to both enforce and resist the will of rulers. The United States of America is a nation born well after the invention of firearms -- a nation whose size and influence expanded alongside the development, and with the use and growth, of personal firearms. What were the GUNS that conquered the land that would become the United States, and how did they develop? How did firearms change the course of this continent's future, and how were advancements in firearm technology used by men and even other nations throughout the American experience? Since 1775 and the "Shot Heard Round the World," American patriots would put muskets to shoulder, and fight for liberty -- a liberty that would be forged in battle, achieved and defended by the AMERICAN GUN. In this new and exclusive 7-part, 400 year history documentary mini-series, we trace and chronicle the events and development of... The GUN, and the Evolution of the Firearm.
imdb.title: Guns: The Evolution of Firearms
